title: No way to forget (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Producers and directors
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Aboriginal Australian prisoners - Death
description: Based on Richard Frankland's experiences as a field officer during the Royal Commission into Aboriginal custody, this film follows the journey of Shane as he drives from Swan Hill to Melbourne after a day in the field. During the night, his experiences play on his mind and imagination. He will be haunted by what he has seen.
